title: No case registered against Zain Qureshi in FIA and police: IHC told
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 14 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Tuesday disposed of the petition of PTI MNA Zain Qureshi after being informed that his name was not currently on the watch list.
Justice Muhammad Azam Khan heard Zain Qureshi’s petition seeking removal of his name from watch list. Zain Qureshi’s lawyer Ali Bukhari appeared in court.
During hearing of the case, Federal Police and Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) submitted their reports and stated that petitioner’s name is not included in watch list.
Islamabad Police DSP Legal Sajid Cheema and Deputy Director Law FIA Muhammad Waqas Rasool submitted the report on behalf of their respective departments.
Police report said that no case registered against Zain Qureshi in any police station of Islamabad.
The FIA also said that Zain Qureshi’s name is not included in any stop list or watch list. His name has not been active in any list since April 27, 2024, it said.
The court disposed of Zain Qureshi’s application after the reports were submitted.
